title: OMG OMG!! DUNKMASTER ILLAOI!
body: She dunks with her W and ULT

replies.body: Some people have actually been asking for Dunkmaster/basketball skins for champs who either have some sort of 'dunk' move  or wield a ball regularly as part of their kit. And honestly I wouldn't mind seeing skins like that myself.

i think it would also be cool to have these skins for non-dunkers but shooters & playmakers, like 3pt ziggs/xerath or assist machine orianna or point bard? also i love that {{champion:201}} idea; maybe give him the mutombo finger wag...

disclaimer: i have nothing to do with the skins team

> [{quoted}](name=Bilby,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=sBIZsvHO,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-08-12T04:30:47.157+0000)
>
> i think it would also be cool to have these skins for non-dunkers but shooters & playmakers, like 3pt ziggs/xerath or assist machine orianna or point bard? also i love that {{champion:201}} idea; maybe give him the mutombo finger wag...
> 
> disclaimer: i have nothing to do with the skins team

Dunkmaster Zac, ffs.
Dunk coach Illaoi, since she gives lessons

I think It would be so nice seeing instead of {{champion:420}}  Dunking, having a more defensive thematic. Couldn't you see {{champion:420}}  's ult jump up infront of a hoop to slam an incoming ball down into the ground.
